title: fix: app deploy detection skips root-level files in apps/
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Unclogging the deploy pipes
gist.blurb: We tweaked the automatic deployment sensors to better detect when community apps are ready to bloom.
gist.summary: Refined the CI/CD file detection logic to prevent root-level file changes in the apps directory from interfering with individual app deployments.
gist.impact: Community apps will now deploy more reliably when the central apps registry is updated.
gist.visual_concept: A tiny pixel art bee mechanic adjusting a conveyor belt where boxes (apps) are moving. The bee is holding a wrench.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing a tiny mechanic's hat and holding a wrench, adjusting a colorful conveyor belt carrying pixelated boxes. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'FIXED'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
